mapper.select: SELECT record.id, record.terminal_id as terminalId, record.terminal, record.lng, record.lat, record.`status`, record.is_delete as isDelete, record.create_date as createDate FROM device_online_record record LEFT JOIN car_info car ON record.terminal_id = car.terminal_id WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY record.create_date desc LIMIT 0,1
